alert.note: Alert for Surry; Yadkin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 2:40AM EST until January 10 at 5:30PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina... Yadkin River At Elkin affecting Yadkin and Surry Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Yadkin River at Elkin. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 20.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 16.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:15 AM EST Wednesday was 21.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early this morning and continue falling to 4.8 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 21.8 feet on 11/12/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 245 PM EST.
